We’re Excited to Hear from You!
Have questions about mini-golf, GellyBall, or planning your next big event? Reach out today to plan your visit or ask us anything! Whether it’s a group outing, a birthday celebration, or just a fun-filled day, our team is here to help you create unforgettable memories.
Looking for quick answers? Visit our
FAQs page
to find details about our activities, policies, and more!

Join the Tropical Breeze Fun Park Team!
Be part of a fun and fast-growing company!
Are You Ready to Work in a Dynamic, Exciting Environment?
Tropical Breeze Fun Park is looking for enthusiastic and dedicated individuals to join our team. Whether you’re helping guests on the mini-golf course, assisting with GellyBall adventures, or providing top-notch customer service, you’ll be part of a team that’s all about creating unforgettable experiences for our visitors.
Qualifications:
Must be
18 years or older
(we sell beer and wine).
Availability to work
9:30 AM – 4:00 PM
and/or
4:00 PM – 10:00 PM
shifts.
Flexible schedule with some weekends off.
Complete our employment application to be considered for one of our facility positions.
If you meet the qualifications, we’ll reach out to you!

online form

Fill out my Wufoo form!

The Best Group Event Venue in Cape Coral
Host unforgettable events with activities that inspire fun, teamwork, and celebration.
Why Choose Tropical Breeze for Your Group Event?
At Tropical Breeze Fun Park, we specialize in creating unforgettable group events tailored to your needs. From corporate team-building to family reunions, we provide the perfect setting for fun, bonding, and lasting memories.
Here’s Why Groups Love Us:
Customizable Packages:
Designed to fit your group’s size, budget, and goals.
Exciting Activities:
Mini-golf and GellyBall foster teamwork and friendly competition.
Beautiful Setting:
A tropical-themed venue in the heart of Cape Coral.
Hassle-Free Planning:
Our team takes care of the details so you can enjoy the day.
Z
Corporate Team-Building Events
Elevate Your Team with Fun and Friendly Competition
Looking to boost morale and teamwork? Our corporate event options are designed to build stronger connections within your team. Perfect for management retreats, employee recognition days, and team-building activities.
GellyBall Missions:
Compete on our field with custom missions to see which team comes out on top.
Mini-Golf:
Encourage collaboration and bonding with our tropical-themed course.
Z
Celebrations for Every Occasion
Whether you’re celebrating milestones or simply looking for a great day out, we’re here to make your event special.
We’re Perfect For:
Family reunions
Sports team banquets
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Graduation parties
After-prom celebrations
Teacher appreciation events
No matter the occasion, our event experts will customize a package to meet your needs.
Z
School Outings and Fundraising
Reward, Educate, and Raise Funds—all in One Place!
Bring the classroom to life with entertaining and educational activities at Tropical Breeze.
School Field Trips:
Combine fun and learning with engaging activities that explore Newton’s Laws of Motion and teamwork.
Teacher Appreciation:
Celebrate your school’s educators with a day of relaxation and fun.
Fundraising Events:
Partner with us to create exciting fundraising opportunities for your school or non-profit organization.
DOWNLOAD DONATION REQUEST FORM
We review donation requests monthly, so submit yours in advance to secure support for your event.
Z
Summer Camp and Seasonal Events
Calling All Campers and Counselors!
From shooting range challenges to conquering the world’s longest mini-golf hole, we provide the perfect backdrop for summer camp fun.
Tailored Camp Packages:
Create lasting memories with activities designed for campers of all ages.
Safe and Fun After-Prom Parties:
Celebrate in a secure environment with exciting activities.
Graduation Lock-Ins:
Keep the whole class entertained all night long.
Z
Film Location Rentals
Whether you’re filming a commercial, creating content for social media, or shooting a feature film, our park’s unique features will elevate your production and make it truly memorable.
Eye-catching tropical scenery perfect for a variety of genres.
Distinct attractions like the world’s longest mini-golf hole and GellyBall fields.
Flexible scheduling to accommodate your project needs.
Contact Tropical Breeze:
info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com
239-574-3939
Important Event Information
Non-Refundable Deposit:
A $75.00 deposit is required for all events.
Rain Policy:
In case of threatening rain, Tropical Breeze may cancel the event in consultation with the event coordinator. Deposits can be refunded or applied to a new date.
Cancellation Policy:
Deposits can be applied to a new date if cancellations are made at least 7 days in advance.
CONTACT US TO BOOK TODAY
Book Your Group Event at Cape Coral’s Favorite Fun Park!
Looking for the ultimate venue for your next group event? Whether it’s a corporate retreat, family reunion, school outing, or celebration with friends, Tropical Breeze Fun Park offers customized packages, exciting activities like mini-golf and GellyBall, and a stress-free planning experience.
Contact Us Today to Make Your Event Unforgettable:
Learn more about our flexible packages tailored to your needs.
Check availability for your preferred date.
Get expert help planning every detail of your event.
CONTACT US

About Tropical Breeze Fun Park: Where Fun Meets Adventure in Cape Coral
Creating unforgettable experiences for families, friends, and groups.
Creating Memories That Last a Lifetime in Cape Coral
At
Tropical Breeze Fun Park
, we’re dedicated to bringing people together for unforgettable adventures. Located in beautiful Cape Coral, our park offers something for everyone—whether you’re looking for thrilling activities, a place to celebrate, or a relaxing day of fun.
We believe in creating memories that last a lifetime.
Here’s why Tropical Breeze Fun Park is Cape Coral’s favorite destination:
Z
Mini-Golf Like No Other
Enjoy 18 challenging holes on our tropical-themed course, featuring cascading waterfalls and the world’s longest mini-golf hole.
Z
Adrenaline-Pumping GellyBall
Dive into action-packed GellyBall battles. Perfect for all ages!
Z
Perfect for Events
From birthdays to corporate gatherings, we make planning easy with customizable packages and dedicated party hosts.
Z
Convenient Location
Just minutes from Fort Myers, with free parking and a safe, family-friendly atmosphere.
CHECK OUR PRICES
What Our Guests Have To Say
Jennifer Rodin
Designation
Best mini golf ever! The water features and the little signs and of course the drinks, the other customers, and the workers were just amazing! The music was really great too. We had so much fun. We'll definitely be back again!
Coleen Wybranski
Designation
We chose this as an alternative to Topgolf, and are so glad that we did — it was a miles better alternative for our young family. The staff was super sweet and attentive, and nowhere else will you find such a prompt on-course delivery service! The next time we’re in Florida we’re definitely going to make this a destination.
Tiffany Rollman
Designation
This was hands down the best maintained course my kids and I have ever been on. The kids loved the different challenges on each hole and the electronic score card was an awesome addition. It is clear that the staff care about the upkeep, because the course is in pristine condition and they do a stunning job with the landscaping. We definitely plan to come back when we travel here again next year!
Mike Humphreys
Designation
Had a lot of fun, very nice place with fun Putt-Putt holes. Prices weren't too bad and they also serve alcohol (wine slushies/beer) It's a very well maintained park with some challenging holes, including the "world's longest putt-putt hole" which is the 18th hole. We had a nice time, the employees were very nice and we all just had a fun time. I would definitely recommend to anyone that hasn't been here yet, it's a good time!
4
5
Make Every Visit More Rewarding!
Turn your fun into rewards with the Tropical Breeze Loyalty Program! It’s free to join and packed with perks designed to make your visits even more exciting. From earning points on every purchase to receiving special birthday bonuses, this is the ultimate way to get more out of your time at the park.
Don’t miss out on:
Exclusive rewards and cash back on purchases.
Special offers just for members.
Fun bonuses throughout the year!
JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
Plan Your Visit Today!
Whether you’re stopping by for mini-golf, GellyBall, or a special event, Tropical Breeze Fun Park is ready to make your day extraordinary.
Questions? Contact Us
